targets.expr: sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="fastpath function call"}) by (datname) > 0
sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="idle in transaction"}) by (datname) > 0
sum(pg_stat_activity_count{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace", state="idle in transaction (aborted)"}) by (datname) > 0
sum(postgres_exporter_build_info{job=~"$job", namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (branch, goarch, goos, goversion, revision, tags, version)
